infos.title: Stakes of Wrath
infos.characteristics: [Deadly Boomerage] cast after [Body Crash] leaves permanent scars on enemies. As Lakreil will stop casting [Dealy Boomerang] once [Rage of Lakreil expires, you should dodge his attacks or deal massive P.DMG to him.

1.name: Deadlly Boomerang
1.description: Throws a boomerang to all frontal enemies, dealing P.DMG 4 times, and reduces ther Heal Rate by 1% permanently. The attack does not cease until [Rage of Lakreil] expires.

2.name: Body Crash
2.description: Charges at frontal enemies, dealing P.DMG and knocking them down. Afterward, gains [Rage of Lakreil] and casts [Deadly Boomerang].

3.name: Raging Strike
3.description: Leaps up high and strikes the ground, removing positive effect from all enemies, dealing P.DMG, and reducing their All Dodge Chance by 300 for 10 sec. This attack is unavoidable.

4.name: Enrage
4.description: Increases the caster's ATK by 50% and ACC by 300 for 20 sec.

5.name: Rage of Lakreil
5.description: Decreases by 5 when the enemy successfully dodges an attack of the caster, and by 1 when the caster takes P.DMG When Rage of Lakreil expires, the caster becomes powerless and takes increased DMG for a certain time.

6.name: Stakes of Wrath
6.description: Lakreil's ATK Spd and DEF cannot be reduced and Lakreil ignores all DMG Reduction effects of enemies. Additionally, enemies become unable to recover their Mana for 1 sec after using a Skill.
